title: Nery (Travessa do)
body: Located in the parish of Santa Maria, it took its name from Canon Vicente Nery da Silva, who resided there. It was widened and is now a street that connects Bela de S. Tiago street with Conde de Carvalhal road, being named Caminho do Acciaioly.

Santa Maria: Parish where the Nery alley was located
Bela de S. Tiago: Location of one end of the street that connects with Nery alley
Conde de Carvalhal: Location of the other end of the street that connects with Nery alley

Canon Vicente Nery da Silva: Person who gave name to Nery alley
